paper_abstract: In the present note it is shown that the examples presented in a recent paper by Basaran are incorrect. The correct exact solutions are also presented here. In this way, a new direction for approximating fuzzy inverse matrix is proposed. In this paper, the first step we solve the center part of fully fuzzy linear system, then we solve the spread part of the equation system. (C) 2014 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A discussion on "Calculating fuzzy inverse matrix using fuzzy linear equation system"
